煴字的基本解释

煴
yūn
燃微火的火堆：“凿地为坎，置煴火，覆武其上。”
燃烧不旺的火堆冒出的浓烟：“此时放火作煴，少得烟气，则免于霜矣。”

煴
yǔn
闷热。

煴字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yūn］
［《廣韻》於云切，平文，影。］
亦作“煾2”。“熅1”的新字形。
(1)郁烟，不见火焰的燃烧而产生出来的许多烟。
(2)微火；无焰的火。
(3)温暖；暖和。
(4)温和；宽容。
[②]［yùn］
［《集韻》紆問切，去焮，影。］
“熅2”的新字形。
用烙铁或熨斗烫平衣物。

煴字的康熙字典解释
煴字的源字形

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体韩国明朝体
煴字的起名意思

本意是指无焰的火，也有温暖，温和，宽容，恭顺的意思。

Scorched
Basic explanation of words
Scorched
yūn
A fire with a slight fire: "The ground is a hurdle, the fire is set, and the force is overwhelmed."
Thick smoke from a sluggish fire: "At this time, the fire will be scorched, and if there is less smoke, it will be free from frost."
Scorched
yǔn
Sultry.
Scorched
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yūn］
["Guangyun" Yu Yunqie, plain text, shadow. ]
Also known as "Yuan 2". The new glyph of "熅1".
(1) Fume is full of smoke, not seeing a lot of smoke produced by the burning of flames.
(2) Microfire; flameless fire.
(3) Warm; warm.
(4) Gentle; tolerant.
[②]［yùn］
["Ji Yun" asks and cuts, goes to Yan, film. ]
The new glyph of "熅2".
Use a soldering iron or iron to iron the clothes.

Scorched
Name meaning
The original meaning refers to flameless fire, which also means warmth, gentleness, tolerance, and submissiveness.
yùn, yūn
1) yùn вм. 熨
2) yūn слабый огонь, огонь без языков пламени
